pages.text: This... No, this cannot be right. Is this all that this can be used for? An alternative source of demon will? I refuse to believe that, but... Nothing else I have tried over the past two months has worked thus far! This is not a dead end, there is more to this! There must be! For all the effort I have put in, there must be more! Not to mention the suspicious townsfolk, they are starting to wise up...

I suppose I should actually document how to use these raw souls to make demon will, for future reference... Simply placing a grand tartaric gem with a raw soul in any crafting grid will fill the gem up completely. Additionally, it seems that the stored wills type can be cycled using a hellfire forge, though at a high cost.
